Package semsim.annotation

Interface Annotatable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositePhysicalEntity, CustomPhysicalEnergyDifferential, CustomPhysicalEntity, CustomPhysicalProcess, DataStructure, Decimal, MappableVariable, MMLchoice, PhysicalDependency, PhysicalEnergyDifferential, PhysicalEntity, PhysicalModelComponent, PhysicalProcess, PhysicalProperty, PhysicalPropertyInComposite, ReferencePhysicalDependency, ReferencePhysicalEntity, ReferencePhysicalProcess, SBMLFunctionOutput, SemSimInteger, SemSimModel, UnitOfMeasurement
public interface Annotatable
Interface providing methods for annotating SemSim model elements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAnnotation​(Annotation ann)
    Add a SemSim Annotation to this object
    void addReferenceOntologyAnnotation​(Relation relation, java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String description, SemSimLibrary lib)
    Add a SemSim ReferenceOntologyAnnotation to an object
    java.util.Set<Annotation> getAnnotations()  
    java.util.Set<ReferenceOntologyAnnotation> getReferenceOntologyAnnotations​(Relation relation)
    Get all SemSim ReferenceOntologyAnnotations applied to an object that use a specific SemSimRelations.SemSimRelation.
    java.lang.Boolean hasPhysicalDefinitionAnnotation()  
    java.lang.Boolean isAnnotated()  
    void removeAllReferenceAnnotations()
    Delete all ReferenceOntologyAnnotations applied to this object
    void setAnnotations​(java.util.Set<Annotation> annset)
    Set the SemSim Annotations for an object

  • Method Details

    • getAnnotations

      java.util.Set<Annotation> getAnnotations()
      Returns:
      All SemSim Annotations applied to this object

    • setAnnotations

      void setAnnotations​(java.util.Set<Annotation> annset)
      Set the SemSim Annotations for an object
      Parameters:
      annset - The set of annotations to apply

    • addAnnotation

      void addAnnotation​(Annotation ann)
      Add a SemSim Annotation to this object
      Parameters:
      ann - The Annotation to add

    • addReferenceOntologyAnnotation

      void addReferenceOntologyAnnotation​(Relation relation, java.net.URI uri, java.lang.String description, SemSimLibrary lib)
      Add a SemSim ReferenceOntologyAnnotation to an object
      Parameters:
      relation - The SemSimRelations.SemSimRelation that qualifies the relationship between the object and what it's annotated against
      uri - The URI of the reference ontology term used for annotation
      description - A free-text description of the reference ontology term (obtained from the ontology itself whenever possible).
      lib - A SemSimLibrary instance

    • getReferenceOntologyAnnotations

      java.util.Set<ReferenceOntologyAnnotation> getReferenceOntologyAnnotations​(Relation relation)
      Get all SemSim ReferenceOntologyAnnotations applied to an object that use a specific SemSimRelations.SemSimRelation.
      Parameters:
      relation - The SemSimRelations.SemSimRelation that filters the annotations to return
      Returns:
      All SemSim ReferenceOntologyAnnotations applied to an object that use the specified SemSimRelations.SemSimRelation.

    • removeAllReferenceAnnotations

      void removeAllReferenceAnnotations()
      Delete all ReferenceOntologyAnnotations applied to this object

    • isAnnotated

      java.lang.Boolean isAnnotated()
      Returns:
      True if an object has at least one Annotation, otherwise false.

    • hasPhysicalDefinitionAnnotation

      java.lang.Boolean hasPhysicalDefinitionAnnotation()
      Returns:
      True if an object has at least one ReferenceOntologyAnnotation, otherwise false;
